## TriggerCalib 1.5.1 (28-11-2025)

TriggerCalib 1.5.1 is built from ``master`` and contains the following changes with respect to 1.5.0.

Potentially breaking changes are labelled with :warning:


### New features
 - Added functionality to include friend trees (!85 from @ascarabo)

### Bug fixes
 - Removed uproot conversions (!86)
 - Patch ``utils.stats.wilson`` to work with ``List`` objects (!87)
